problem.markdown:
>>The carrying capacity of a population is determined by its<< () birth rate () death rate (x) limiting resources () infant mortality () replacement level fertility
[explanation] The carrying capacity (K) of a population is defined as the number of organisms a given habitat can hold indefinitely. It is determined by its limiting resources such as food, water and space. [explanation]
problem.p: The carrying capacity of a population is determined by its

div.p: The carrying capacity (K) of a population is defined as the number of organisms a given habitat can hold indefinitely. It is determined by its limiting resources such as food, water and space.
